name: photogrid
description: is a Widget which can help you to render a lot of photo in different patterns.

data-attrs.name: column-width
data-attrs.description: Default column width. Column number will be decided by Math.round(parentWidth / columnWidth), and then all these columns will be fitted equally.

data-attrs.name: module-node
data-attrs.description: Default module child nodes css selector.

data-attrs.name: photo-node
data-attrs.description: Default image child node css selector. If can not find the Node, a new image node will be inserted under the module node.
